definition: to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage
(of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed
to knock sb out with a drug/to render sb unconscious
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
to cause an accident/to make trouble/to get into trouble
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
